reasons.selfSustaining: Company can sustain operations with equity. Investment can be used to accelerate growth.

risks.selfSustaining: Growth opportunities may be missed but operations continue.
risks.q1Deficit: Transition to positive scenario is not possible without investment. Growth strategy is delayed, market share is lost.
risks.futureDeficit: Planned growth expenses after {{quarter}} become impossible. Positive scenario does not materialize.
